data.name: Check x Mate Demo
data.detailed_description:
Free Demo of our upcoming game, Check x Mate!
Try all the latest gameplay, story, and other features as they are added.
The game's main gameplay element follows real chess, and as so you will develop your chess skills and be able to apply tactics learned to real chess games!

This is a chess puzzle dating sim set in a world torn asunder by a century-long war—which the Schwarz Kingdom is set to lose until you and your twin are transported from our world and right in the middle of it, each holding a true game changer: magical crowns that give you the power to control the battlefield as a chess board.

Enter the magical world and Journey back to the Schwarz castle with allies, warding off foes as you get used to commanding an army.

Current Features:
  • A Magical Chess world, where the pieces are people that you interact with
  • Befriend a Schwarz Knight, Bishop, Rook and the Queen and team up with them in battle
  • A fantastical adventure where your decisions really matter
  • Choice between full VN story or abbreviated version
  • Beginner difficulty for beginners and those new to chess, or if you just want to focus on the story
  • Beginner difficulty focuses on teaching and testing basic chess tactics such as forks, castling, pins, checkmate, and much more
  • Expert difficulty designed for those who want more of a challenge (estimated puzzle ratings 800-1200)
  • Hundreds of hand crafted chess puzzles to find and solve throughout the story
  • Additional Chess gauntlet for a series of selected puzzles to complete

data.short_description: Demo of a fantasy visual novel set in a magical world of chess. Gameplay consists mainly of decision making and chess puzzles that represent what is happening in the story. There is a beginner difficulty for those new to chess and expert difficulty for those who seek more of a challenge.
